author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL STORM IVO FORMS SOUTH OF MEXICO... ...LOCALLY HEAVY RAINS AND ROUGH SURF WILL AFFECT COASTAL SECTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO...
summary: ...TROPICAL STORM IVO FORMS SOUTH OF MEXICO... ...LOCALLY HEAVY RAINS AND ROUGH SURF WILL AFFECT COASTAL SECTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... As of 3:00 PM CST Wed Aug 06 the center of Ivo was located near 14.2, -99.1 with movement WNW at 22 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1008 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Ivo (EP4/EP092025)
